javadoc:
Shows the modal dialog to save tool configuration to the current
 name or to a new name.

methods.javadoc:
Define the Main panel for the dialog here.
@return JPanel the completed Main Panel
methods.name: buildMainPanel
methods.comment: Define the Main panel for the dialog here.

methods.name: show
methods.comment:
Display the "Save Tool Configuration As..." dialog;
 blocks until user hits the "Cancel" button.

methods.javadoc:
Calls a method in ToolManager to save the tool configuration to a
 different name.
methods.name: save
methods.comment:
Calls a method in ToolManager to save the tool configuration to a
 different name.

methods.javadoc: Invoked when the 'Cancel' button is clicked
methods.name: cancelCallback
methods.comment: Invoked when the 'Cancel' button is clicked

methods.javadoc:
Create a panel that has text fields for entering a 
 name and tool description
methods.name: createToolFieldPanel
methods.comment:
Create a panel that has text fields for entering a 
 name and tool description

methods.javadoc: Add listeners for components in the icon panel.
methods.name: addIconPanelListeners
methods.comment: Add listeners for components in the icon panel.

methods.javadoc: Pop up a file chooser for the user to look for icon images.
methods.name: browseForIcons
methods.comment: Pop up a file chooser for the user to look for icon images.

methods.javadoc: Set the picture with the icon.
methods.name: setPicture
methods.comment: Set the picture with the icon.

methods.javadoc:
Set the icon and the description on the tool and call the method
 in ToolServices to save the tool.
methods.name: saveToolConfig
methods.comment:
Set the icon and the description on the tool and call the method
 in ToolServices to save the tool.

methods.javadoc: Get the icons from the icon map.
methods.name: loadIcons
methods.comment: Get the icons from the icon map.

methods.javadoc: Update the icon map and the list model for the icon name.
methods.name: updateMap
methods.comment: Update the icon map and the list model for the icon name.

name: SaveToolConfigDialog
comment:
Shows the modal dialog to save tool configuration to the current
 name or to a new name.

fields.javadoc: Preference name for images directory that was last accessed.
fields.name: LAST_ICON_DIRECTORY
fields.comment: Preference name for images directory that was last accessed.
